title: BIM attribute statistics
description: Concatenated attribute statistics . Notes: if needed the type (string or number) of the attribute may be infer from the `mostFrequentValues` and/or `min`/`max` fields

label.description: Label of the field name. If label is empty the label and fieldName are identical. Labels are shown in the UI for filter types, for example.

modelName.description: Useful for building information such as filter or phases to be a fixed string. Used by client application to define specific behavior for the modelName _TODO: get the full list_

mostFrequentValues.description: Most frequent value, if applicable for this attribute. Truncated to 256 entries.

subLayerIds.description: List of sublayers where this attribute may be found.

examples.title: `integral` attribute with `modelName` to specify filterable semantic
